Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?

I'm here to help! Could you please let me know which platform you're trying to integrate the postback with? This will help me provide you with the most accurate instructions.

Great! For setting up a RedTrack Postback on NewsBreak, you can follow the detailed guide available in our Help Center. Here's the link to the article: [How to set up a RedTrack Postback on NewsBreak](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25515090832013-How-to-set-up-a-RedTrack-Postback-on-NewsBreak). If you have any specific questions or run into issues, feel free to ask!

I'm sorry to hear you're encountering an 'invalid operation' error. Could you please provide more details about when this error occurs? For example, is it happening during a specific step in the setup process? This information will help me assist you better.
WHEN AFTER DOING EVERYTHING I AM SAVING IT

Thanks for the details! It sounds like there might be an issue with the configuration settings. Please double-check that all parameters and tokens are correctly entered as per the RedTrack setup guide. If everything seems correct and you're still facing issues, I recommend reaching out to your RedTrack support team for further assistance, as they can provide more specific troubleshooting based on their platform.
